# z-stepper

```html
<z-stepper>
  <z-stepper-item
    index="1"
    disabled
  ></z-stepper-item>
  <z-stepper-item
    index="2"
    pressed
  ></z-stepper-item>
  <z-stepper-item
    index="3"
    disabled
  ></z-stepper-item>
</z-stepper>
<z-stepper>
  <z-stepper-item
    index="1"
    pressed
    >I tuoi dati</z-stepper-item
  >
  <z-stepper-item index="2">Le tue credenziali</z-stepper-item>
  <z-stepper-item index="3">Conferma</z-stepper-item>
</z-stepper>
```
